author: Joshua Robinson
title: Real Madrid Tops Liverpool in Champions League Final - WSJ
text:
KIEV, Ukraine—All through this charmed Liverpool season, when it scored for fun and romped back into European soccer’s elite, one question hung over the club: Where would Liverpool be without Mohamed Salah, its electric superhero from Egypt?
The last place it wanted to find out was in a Champions League final against Real Madrid. But Liverpool didn’t get to choose. When Salah left the field in tears after 30 minutes of club soccer’s most prestigious game with a shoulder injury, the entire tone of its season shifted.
...
